ru: Я рисую хаос до того, как он станет формой.
Неон не украшает, он подсвечивает смысл.
Там, где боль, там и форма.
Я не делаю ‘красиво’. Я делаю честно.
Сердца здесь не милые. Они настоящие.
Мой стиль — след, а не фильтр.
Каждая работа — маленький выход из шторма.
День и UV: два режима одной правды.
Я оставляю следы, чтобы ты нашёл(ла) себя.
Мой неон не кричит. Он светит.
en: My heart draws the truth.
Lines speak where words fail.
Neon aqua is my impulse.
The spiral is a way inward.
Honesty without makeup.
Light hand, deep soul.
I draw chaos before it becomes form.
A heart begins with a line.
A spiral doesn’t spin, it guides.
No posing. Just nerve.
Messy sketch: truth without an eraser.
Neon doesn’t decorate, it reveals.
Where it hurts, form begins.
I don’t make it ‘pretty’. I make it honest.
The line trembles because it’s alive.
These hearts aren’t cute. They’re real.
The spiral remembers the way back.
My style is a trace, not a filter.
What’s lived through is what glows.
Even emptiness can be drawn.
Ocean inside. Neon outside.
Each stroke is a contract with reality.
I hold chaos on a thread.
Heart: the anchor point.
Spiral: a funnel of depth.
Lines don’t lie. People do.
If the hand writes, the soul breathes.
Not decor. A map.
Every piece is a small exit from the storm.
Intuition beats symmetry.
Tenderness can be sharp.
Daylight and UV: two modes of one truth.
I leave traces so you can find yourself.
My neon doesn’t scream. It shines.
Chaos becomes form. Again.
